on sheet: [Early Proof----?]
text: As night fell outside, Wanda Gág was indoors making these strange zigzag patterns on the wall, apparently by propping a slightly opened book in front of a kerosene lamp. This print speaks to her fascination with pattern, and to the mystery everyday objects held for her.
title: Evening
